abstract: International Energy Agency warns, in annual World Energy outlook,  that landmark climate change accord signed by almost 200 nations is too weak to meet its stated temperature target; release comes as negotiators from across globe are gathering in Morocco to hash out accord's details.

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The International Energy Agency warned that reaching the ambitious targets set forth by last year’s global climate change accord would be next to impossible.
snippet: The International Energy Agency warned that reaching the ambitious targets set forth by last year’s global climate change accord would be next to impossible....

headline.main: Paris Climate Deal Is Too Weak to Meet Goals, Report Finds
headline.print_headline: Climate Deal Called Too Weak to Meet Goals
